alert.note: Alert for Adair; Haskell; Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 3:32PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton, western Madison, western Franklin, northwestern Carroll, Crawford, Sebastian, Washington, northeastern Haskell, Sequoyah, Adair and northern Le Flore Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong showers with embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bella Vista to 3 miles southwest of Bokoshe. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Van Buren... Siloam Springs... Sallisaw... Poteau... Berryville... Stilwell... Charleston... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Bella Vista... Greenwood... Lowell... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 31. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 301 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
